abstract: He was chief executive of Credit Suisse’s investment bank for three years until stepping aside last year after his diagnosis of cancer: non-Hodgkin’s Lymphoma.
snippet: He was chief executive of Credit Suisse’s investment bank for three years until stepping aside last year after his diagnosis of cancer: non-Hodgkin’s Lymphoma.
lead_paragraph: 2:51 p.m. | Updated Paul Calello, the chairman of the investment bank at Credit Suisse Group who helped navigate the Swiss bank through the financial crisis, died on Tuesday at his home in Brooklyn Heights. He was 49.

headline.main: Paul Calello of Credit Suisse Dies at 49
